title: Enchantment Spells
content: nate Person Lv 5 Enchantment ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Make a humanoid fight alongside you. Every time the creature takes damage, it makes a Wisdom Saving Throw against your domination. Allies cannot be dominated.10 Turns18mWIS SaveConcentration Bard, Sorcerer, Wizard Hold Monster Lv 5 Enchantment ActionLevel 5 Spell Slot Paralyse a creature. It can't move, act or react. Attacks from within 3m are always Critical Hits.10 TurnsNo affect on undead. 18m WIS SaveConcentration Bard, Sorcerer, Warlock,
